```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)

# roster of students with github handles
students <- tribble(
  ~Name, ~github,
  'Rishi Arora', 'rishigarora',
  'Jongyoon Baik', 'JongyoonBaik',
  'Rita Biagioli & Carly Offidani-Bertrand', 'futureofmaya',
  'Jonathan Camacho', 'jonathanecm',
  'ChihYu Chiang & Shun Wang', 'vincentwangpsy',
  'Emily Forden', 'EmilyForden',
  'Tong Ju & Yuhao Zhuang', 'jtbeyond',
  'Bobae Kang', 'bobaekang',
  'Jordan Martin', 'JordanAMartin',
  'Brian Pennington', 'brianp',
  'Haitong Xu', 'XuHaitongUC'
)

# create links and print the table
students %>%
  mutate(`Project website` = str_c("https://uc-cfss.github.io/fp-", github),
         `Project repo` = str_c("https://github.com/uc-cfss/fp-", github)) %>%
  select(-github) %>%
  kable()
```
